about_the_game:
Fishtronomy is an adorable casual cozy puzzle game about guiding fish through space and completing constellations! It's your first day as a junior Fishtronomer and together with your new partner Phebe, it's your job to help decorate the night sky.

This small-slice demo of the game features a limited selection of maps, taken from the game's introduction, which is intended to give an idea of what the core gameplay of Fishtronomy is. As well as the visual style and progression. The demo includes 7 short puzzles from the game as well as a glimpse into the small narrative of the game.
detailed_description:
Fishtronomy is an adorable casual cozy puzzle game about guiding fish through space and completing constellations! It's your first day as a junior Fishtronomer and together with your new partner Phebe, it's your job to help decorate the night sky.

This small-slice demo of the game features a limited selection of maps, taken from the game's introduction, which is intended to give an idea of what the core gameplay of Fishtronomy is. As well as the visual style and progression. The demo includes 7 short puzzles from the game as well as a glimpse into the small narrative of the game.
name: Fishtronomy Demo
short_description: Fishtronomy is an adorable minimalistic puzzle game where you launch fish through space to form constellations and help decorate the skies! Make the sights in Fishtronomy.
